verses.text: Ha Jehová ix alan t'a Vajalil: Emanh k'ojan t'a in wach' k'ab' tik, masanto ol vak'canoch eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayach t'a yalanh oc, xchi Jehová.
Mamin Rey, a Jehová ol ak'an opisio yic tzak' yajalil t'a Sion masanto t'a slajvub' lum lum. Ol ak' yajalil t'a yib'anh eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayach.

Ayic ol ak'an oval yet' eb' ajk'ool, ol ja eb' a chonhab', ol yak'anoch sb'a eb' t'a oval chi' ed'oc. Icha yal ak'val t'a q'uinhib'alil, icha chi' ol aj sja eb' winh quelemtac t'a jun tzalan to icnhej yaji.
Yak'nac pax kan sti' Jehová, malaj b'ak'uinh ol sq'uexa', yalnac t'ayach icha tik: Sacerdote ach t'a masanil tiempo, icha yopisio winhaj Melquisedec, xchi.
Mamin Jehová, ayek' winh Rey t'a a wach' k'ab'. Ha t'a jun k'ual ol te cot yoval winh, ol satjoquel eb' rey yuj winh.
Ha winh ol ak'an syaelal juntzanh nivac nación, ol cham anima, b'alb'umb'a ol aj eb' chamnac yuj winh. Ol satjoquel eb' yajal t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik yuj winh.
Ha t'a yol b'e ol yuk'a' winh Rey t'a jun ha ha' sb'eyi, yuj chi' ol och yip winh.
